import React,{useState}from'react';import{addBook}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookForm=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[author,setAuthor]=useState('');const[publisher,setPublisher]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();addBook({title,author,publisher}).then(newBook=>{console.log('New Book:',newBook);// Optionally update book list
});setTitle('');setAuthor('');setPublisher('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"book-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Title",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Author",value:author,onChange:e=>setAuthor(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Publisher",value:publisher,onChange:e=>setPublisher(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Book"})]});};export default BookForm;
